root.texto: Hey #INDIANA! You're one of the Lucky 4 States with early #Primaries. VOTE MAY 8, 2018 Register by April 9 here: https://t.co/dJwB8Y0ooU Or Text "Indiana" to 2VOTE (28683) Start #BlueWave2018 Here's a THREAD of All Democratic Candidates #BlueWaveIN in All Districts with Websites https://t.co/xqM9JSS6y8 INDIANA PRIMARIES #IN01 #IN02 #IN03 #IN04 #IN05 #IN06 #IN07 #IN08 #IN09 PRIMARY VOTE MAY 8, 2018 THREAD of All (*that I could locate) Democratic Candidates including Websites Voter Registration Deadline Apr 9, 2018 Register here: https://t.co/dJwB8Y0ooU #BlueWave2018 #BlueWaveIN https://t.co/4g6ln0L5Ib ABSENTEE BALLOT from APRIL 10 Mail-in Deadline applications April 30, 2018 All registered voters are eligible to vote absentee-in-person from 28 days before Election Application in-person & mail-in ballots here https://t.co/V4X0rE6pgr Military? https://t.co/XaLg2nJVoq https://t.co/Sd1g1CvldQ #Indiana strictly requires Photo ID to Vote ID Requirements here https://t.co/sS5On7h1j0 Don't have ID? Contact #SpreadTheVote here https://t.co/goQXbKcKhs to get help through all of the steps of getting an ID & they can help with the fees, too! #VoterID #VoterSuppression https://t.co/Z7E0GrRXtn Indiana has some voter purging problems. Check & Doublecheck that you are still Registered to Vote here: https://t.co/gSovgxM0kB or here: https://t.co/zy54p4HqhO #VoterPurging #VoterSuppression #EveryVoteCounts https://t.co/RA3WMmghMU #CongressRun2018 #IN01 #IN1 Democratic Incumbent Peter J. Visclosky https://t.co/JZawrH14nL @TeamVisclosky DEM Challengers: Larry Chubb https://t.co/5FS1cn3Apx Antonio (Tony) Daggett, Sr Primaries Vote MAY 8, 2018 #Midterms2018 #BlueWave https://t.co/8o4zRCaG9q Primaries #IN02 #IN2 vs GOP Incumbent Jackie Walorski DEMS: Douglas Carpenter Pat Hackett https://t.co/Ko3CCTTenY @HackettCongress Mel Hall, Health Care https://t.co/4z1OSwlBcM @melforcongress Yatish Joshi https://t.co/kHmtuR3xvw @joshiforindiana Roland E. Leech John H. Petroff https://t.co/GyoRtaxezq Primaries #IN03 #IN3 vs GOP Incumbent Jim Banks John F. Roberson, Ex-Police Officer https://t.co/u13SH1DNGS Tommy A. Schrader, Blue Collar Worker https://t.co/BPyZAmq9O1 Courtney Tritch https://t.co/yuCaXE5NjS @CourtneyTritch Marketing Exec & Progressive Activist #BlueWaveIN https://t.co/awcRCmJLls Primaries #IN04 #IN4 Tobi Beck @BeckForIndiana https://t.co/GakkusdBgw Roger D. Day https://t.co/Mf52MBMmnq @DayForCongress Darin Patrick Griesey https://t.co/QSCUhTr1Yy @Darin4Change Joseph W. Mackey https://t.co/4reDEXXAVc https://t.co/ZjTIQUyNhv Primaries #IN05 vs GOP Susan Brooks Dion Douglas https://t.co/MO1HO0lmne @Dion_IN05 Sean Dugdale https://t.co/KHCiLsr9tK Eshel Faraggi https://t.co/RPDV0rE1cs @eshel4congress Kyle Moore https://t.co/SEcHzF1oqG @KyleforCongress Dee Thornton https://t.co/9VEmABgAL2 @votethornton https://t.co/AqhZYRdUBT #IN06 vs GOP Luke Messer George Holland https://t.co/Xm1mUfSVnY Jeannine Lake https://t.co/DIZjLa4mpr @JeaninneLeeLake Jasen Lave https://t.co/0fskV0yY4H https://t.co/2nAqM3ifPI Jim Pruett https://t.co/ri7KvN0ZLT Lane Siekman https://t.co/SAhM1bMdiC @LaneSiekman Joshua Williamson https://t.co/ZFWPQqzC0a #IN07 VOTE May 8, 2018 Democratic Incumbent Andre D. Carson https://t.co/2tmgmtruz5 @Andre4Congress Curtis D. Godfrey https://t.co/uT2b8gEKsq Bob Kern @IndianaKern Pierre Quincy Pullins https://t.co/3XfFsfgvDL Sue Spicer https://t.co/1QeSwYubr7 @spicer4congress #BlueWave2018 https://t.co/UPpQbLOAPK #IN08 #IN8 Primaries MAY 8, 2018 Register to Vote by April 9 here: https://t.co/dJwB8Y0ooU William Tanoos https://t.co/2hweLvUs6V @Tanoos2018 vs GOP Incumbent Larry Bucshon #Midterms2018 #BlueWaveIN https://t.co/RRuABQE8V3 #IN09 #IN9 vs GOP Incumbent Trey Hollingsworth Dan Canon https://t.co/UCR43rrmzO @canonforIndiana Rob Chatlos https://t.co/ws8kbiiMTP @chatcub71 Liz Watson https://t.co/Fli3gZhbxZ @LizForIndiana #BlueWaveIsComing https://t.co/Ibmegg0RqI SECRETARY OF STATE: vs GOP Incumbent Connie Lawson Jim Harper, Attorney https://t.co/dRdtE1M3Hh https://t.co/5llQ5M6kFG https://t.co/NvxFso169l https://t.co/vznSWVWkA5 And, don't forget your PROSECUTING ATTORNEYS Watch this 2-minute video from the ACLU on how powerful Prosecuting (District) Attorneys are and make sure to check out the ones running in your county! And VOTE! https://t.co/lKGFrs9bbV https://t.co/L8iLOWWozz
